<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Revenue by Category
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Software and Services Revenue
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Software and services revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$130 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	28.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$74 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, representing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	an increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$56 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	75.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Company believes that the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in software and services revenue over the prior fiscal year was primarily attributable to the increase in revenue from software licensing, as well as revenue from advertising and technical support.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For a discussion of the Company&#8217;s revenue recognition policies and critical accounting estimates, see the section entitled &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;">
	Accounting Policies and Critical Accounting Estimates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;">
	Accounting Policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221; and &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;">
	Accounting Policies and Critical Accounting Estimates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;">
	Critical Accounting Estimates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;- Revenue Recognition.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the second quarter of fiscal 2016, the Company stated that it expected a double-digit quarterly growth rate in software revenues, excluding technology licensing,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	on a year-over-year basis. Software revenues, excluding technology licensing, increased by approximately 75% in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2016 c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;">
	ompared to the fourth quarter of fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Hardware Revenue
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Hardware revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$184 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	39.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$274 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	41.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, representing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$90 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	32.8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Company recognized revenue related to approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;BlackBerry handheld devices in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, reflecting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;devices, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	53.8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;BlackBerry handheld devices recognized in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Company believes that the significant decrease in hardware revenue over the prior fiscal year period was primarily attributable to decreased hardware demand, partially offset by an increase in the average selling prices with the introduction of new devices, including the PRIV, Passport SE, Classic, and Leap.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;BlackBerry smartphones were sold through to end customers, which included shipments made and recognized prior to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and which reduced the Company&#8217;s inventory in channel. The number of BlackBerry smartphones that were sold through to end customers was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	third quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage129"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	BlackBerry Limited
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<A NAME="FIS_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION_21"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Management&#8217;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Service Access Fees Revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Service access fees revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$158 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	52.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$143 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	30.8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$301 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	45.6%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in service access fees revenue, which is generated from users of BlackBerry 7 and prior BlackBerry operating systems, is primarily attributable to a lower number of those users and corresponding lower revenue from those users (particularly as those users upgrade to BlackBerry devices that do not generate service access fees or to a competitor&#8217;s device), compared to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and a continued shift in the mix of the Company&#8217;s customers from higher-tiered unlimited plans to prepaid and lower-tiered plans as well as pricing reduction programs implemented by the Company to maintain the customer base.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the third quarter of fiscal 2016, the Company stated its expectations that service access fees revenues would decline by approximately 18% in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2016. Service access fees revenues for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;decreased by approximately 17% compared to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	third quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Company expects service access fees revenue to continue to decline by 18% in the first quarter of fiscal 2017.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Other Revenue
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Other revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	36.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$11 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was primarily attributable to decreases in non-warranty repair revenue, partially offset by telecommunications revenue of AtHoc.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Gross Margin
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Gross margin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$108 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	34.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$210 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	45.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$318 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	48.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Excluding the relevant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2016 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2015 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, gross margin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$83 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$237 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	48.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$320 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	48.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$83 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in gross margin was primarily attributable to a decrease in the number of devices for which revenue was recognized due to decreased hardware demand, as well as a reduction in service access fees revenue. The decrease was partially offset by an increase in software and services revenue, as well as an increase in the average selling prices of certain devices recognized, as previously described. Generally, service revenues earn higher gross margins than sales of handheld devices and hardware revenues have lower gross margins than the Company&#8217;s overall gross margin.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the third quarter of fiscal 2016, the Company stated that in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2016 it expected non-GAAP gross margin of approximately 40% and expected gross margin on hardware to increase. The non-GAAP gross margin in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	48.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;due to higher margins in hardware and software and services. The Company expects non-GAAP gross margin in the first quarter of fiscal 2017 of approximately 45% to 50%.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	BlackBerry Limited
</FONT>
</DIV>

	Operating Expenses
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

	November&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and the quarter ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Company believes it is meaningful to also provide a comparison between the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;given that the Company&#8217;s quarterly operating results vary substantially.

<TD COLSPAN="20" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	For the Three Months Ended
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">

	(in millions)

<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="6" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operating expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$111 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	32.6%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$451 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	97.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$340 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	62.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	third quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Excluding the impact of the relevant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2016 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q3 Fiscal 2016 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, operating expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$22 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.9%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was primarily attributable to decreases in marketing, advertising and legal costs, partially offset by increases in foreign exchange losses and external advisory fees.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operating expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$27 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$451 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	97.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$424 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	64.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of revenue, in the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Excluding the impact of the relevant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2016 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2015 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, operating expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$36 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was primarily attributable to decreases in marketing, advertising and salaries and benefits costs, partially offset by increases in foreign exchange losses compared to the fourth quarter of fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Research and Development Expense
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Research and development expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$26 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	19.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$108 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$134 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Excluding the impact of the relevant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2016 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2015 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, research and development expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$39 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	31.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was primarily attributable to decreases in salaries and benefits costs and reductions in materials and outsourcing costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	23
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	BlackBerry Limited
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<A NAME="FIS_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION_23"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Management&#8217;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Selling, Marketing and Administration Expenses
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Selling, marketing and administration expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$41 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	29.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$179 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$138 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Excluding the impact of the relevant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2016 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2015 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, selling, marketing and administration expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$13 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was primarily attributable to increases in foreign exchange losses and salaries and expenses, which were partially offset by decreases in marketing and advertising expenses and decline in maintenance costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Amortization Expense
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The table below presents a comparison of amortization expense relating to property, plant and equipment and intangible assets recorded as amortization or cost of sales for the quarter ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to the quarter ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Intangible assets are comprised of patents, licenses and acquired technology.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Amortization
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Amortization expense relating to certain property, plant and equipment and certain intangible assets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$77 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$68 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in amortization expense was primarily attributable to the intangibles acquired from businesses previously discussed, partially offset by the lower cost base of assets as a result of the divestiture of the majority of the Company&#8217;s real estate holdings and additional asset sales, as well as reduced spending on capital and intangible assets.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Cost of sales
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Amortization expense relating to certain property, plant and equipment and certain intangible assets employed in the Company&#8217;s manufacturing operations and BlackBerry service operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$44 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$50 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$94 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;primarily reflects the lower cost base of assets as a result of asset sales in fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Investment Income (Loss), Net
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Investment income
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$120 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to a loss of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$15 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from a gain of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$105 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in investment income is primarily attributable to the Rockstar Sale in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2015 not present in fiscal 2016, gains on the sale of certain investments in the prior year, and decreases in the Company&#8217;s average cash and investment balances. See &#8220;Financial Condition - Liquidity and Capital Resources&#8221; below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Income Taxes
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Company&#8217;s net effective income tax expense rate was approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2,900%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for the same period in the prior fiscal year. The Company&#8217;s income tax recovery rate also reflects the fact that the Company has a significant valuation allowance in place against its deferred tax assets, and in particular, due to this valuation allowance, the significant income statement impact of the gain from the change in fair value of the Debentures, amongst other items, was offset by a corresponding adjustment of the valuation allowance. The Company&#8217;s net effective income tax recovery rate also reflects the geographic mix of earnings in jurisdictions with different income tax rates.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Net Income (Loss)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#8217;s net
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$238 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.45
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;basic and diluted loss per share on a GAAP basis, reflecting a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in net
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	income
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$266 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to a net
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	income
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$28 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.05
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;basic and diluted earnings per share, in the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Excluding the impact of the relevant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2016 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Q4 Fiscal 2015 Non-GAAP Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Company&#8217;s net loss was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$18 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to a net income of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$44 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, reflecting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in net income of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$62 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;due to an increase in operating expenditures and decreases in the recovery of income taxes and the Company&#8217;s gross margin.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	24
</FONT>
</DIV>

	BlackBerry Limited

	Management&#8217;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The weighted average number of shares outstanding was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	525 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;common shares for basic and diluted loss per share for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The weighted average number of shares outstanding was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	529 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;common shares for basic and diluted earnings per share for the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	Selected Quarterly Financial Data
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	The following table sets forth the Company&#8217;s unaudited quarterly consolidated results of operations data for each of the eight most recent quarters, including the quarter ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The information in the table below has been derived from the Company&#8217;s unaudited interim consolidated financial statements that, in management&#8217;s opinion, have been prepared on a basis consistent with the audited consolidated financial statements of the Company and include all adjustments necessary for a fair presentation of information when read in conjunction with the audited consolidated financial statements of the Company. The Company&#8217;s quarterly operating results have varied substantially in the past and may vary substantially in the future. Accordingly, the information below is not necessarily indicative of results for any future quarter.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Financial Condition
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Liquidity and Capital Resources
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Cash, cash equivalents, and investments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$642 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.6 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3.3 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, primarily as a result of the Good, AtHoc, WatchDox and Encription acquisitions and cash used in the Repurchase Program, partially offset by receipt of the Company&#8217;s fiscal 2015 Canadian income tax refund. The majority of the Company&#8217;s cash, cash equivalents, and investments are denominated in U.S. dollars as at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Current Assets
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in current assets of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1,156 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at the end of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from the end of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was primarily due to decreases in cash and cash equivalents of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$276 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, other current assets of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$273 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, short term investments of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$238 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, income taxes receivable of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$169 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and accounts receivable of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$165 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, accounts receivable was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$338 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;reflects the lower revenues recognized during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	days in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from approximately 69 days at the end of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$122 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, due to increases in raw materials and finished goods, offset by a decrease in work in process.

	&#32;at the end of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from the end of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was primarily due to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in accrued liabilities and deferred revenue. As at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, accrued liabilities were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$368 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, reflecting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$299 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which was primarily attributable to decreases in vendor liabilities, warranty liabilities and accrued incentive payments compared to the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Accounts payable was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$270 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, reflecting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	an increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$35 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which was primarily attributable to amounts owing for the manufacturing of devices. Deferred revenue was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$392 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which reflects
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$78 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;28, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;due to an increase in the volume of transactions that met the criteria for recognition of revenue as at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	26
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage134"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	BlackBerry Limited
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Operating Activities
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in net cash flows provided by operating activities of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$556 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;primarily reflects the Company&#8217;s lower amount of net income after adjustments for non-cash items, offset by net changes in working capital.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Investing Activities
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the fiscal year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February&#160;29, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, cash flows
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	used in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;investing activities were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$439 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and included cash flows used in business acquisitions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$698 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, intangible asset additions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$70 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, acquisitions of property, plant and equipment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$32 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, offset by proceeds on sale or maturity of short-term investments and long-term investments, net of the costs of acquisitions, in the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$357 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. For the same period of the prior fiscal year, cash flows used in investing activities were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.2 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and included cash flows used in transactions involving the proceeds on sale or maturity of short-term investments and long-term investments, net of the costs of acquisitions, in the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$894 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$421 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, business acquisitions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$119 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, acquisitions of property, plant and equipment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$87 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$344 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
